data: Based on the question, "During the past 12 months, has a doctor or other health professional talked to you about understanding the changes in health care who happen at age 18?" Respondents who did not see a health professional in the past 12 months were included in the denominator and categorized as not having discussed healthcare transition with a healthcare professional.

Respondents who did not see a health professional in the past 12 months were included in the denominator and categorized as not having discussed healthcare transition with a healthcare professional.
